Title: Day 422
Writer: Phil Alden Robinson (created by), Michelle King (created by), Robert King (created by), Joey Hartstone, Tegan Shohet (story editor)
Actors: Christine Baranski, Cush Jumbo, Rose Leslie, Sarah Steele
Plot: Reddick, Boseman, and Lockhart represent a young woman who was assaulted while a contestant on a reality dating show; Diane fears she might be the killer's next target.
